attributes.action: stop making guns and selling them to people so that they can use them to kill us when we illegally invade their countries
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
coming from an anti war/violence stance and using the slogan "whilst we teach our children to kill war will never end" i would basically like to see an end to the production and sale of weapons by the uk.
not only would this be a universal gesture of goodwill but it would also most likely make the country a much safer place to live in , bearing in mind the imminent and ever present danger we are facing since we first undertook our war on terror.
.......as the government so keenly likes to keep reminding us. =0)
